pages.text: The Ritual of Persistence keeps chunks loaded in a configurable radius around the master ritual stone. This ensures that your machines, farms, and other contraptions continue to operate even when you're far away.

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: When active, the ritual maintains chunk loading in a 3-chunk radius (configurable) around the ritual stone.$(br2)The ritual consumes LP continuously:$(br)- 100 LP per tick (default)$(br)- Checked every second (20 ticks)$(br)- Total: 2000 LP per second at default settings

pages.title: Deactivation
pages.text: The ritual will automatically stop and unload all chunks if:$(br)- Insufficient LP in the network$(br)- The ritual is manually stopped$(br)- A redstone signal is applied to the master ritual stone$(br2)All chunks are immediately unloaded when the ritual stops, ensuring no orphaned chunk tickets remain.

pages.title: Configuration
pages.text: The Ritual of Persistence can be configured via the server config:$(br)- Chunk Radius: Radius in chunks (default: 3, range: 1-16)$(br)- LP Per Tick: LP cost per tick (default: 100, range: 1-10000)$(br2)Activation Cost: 50000 LP$(br2)Note: Chunk radius is measured in chunks, not blocks. A 3-chunk radius covers a 7x7 chunk area.

pages.title: Ritual Structure
pages.text: The Ritual of Persistence requires 4 Dusk runes (placed at the cardinal directions), 4 Earth runes (for stability), and 4 Air runes (for extended range). The dusk runes symbolize the eternal nature of the ritual.

pages.title: Performance Note
pages.text: Be mindful of the LP cost when using this ritual. At default settings, it consumes 2000 LP per second, which is 120,000 LP per minute.$(br2)Consider using a high-tier Blood Altar and efficient LP generation to sustain this ritual for extended periods.$(br2)The ritual is ideal for permanent bases where continuous operation is essential.
